Cat.description: Small black cat, moves silently and gracefully, its presence comforts the hero
Cat.abilities: Hero's mental state increases by 2 points after killing 10 enemies

Owl.description: Large white owl. Heals the hero by flying nearby and emitting soft, soothing hoots

Spirit.description: Immaterial figure resembling a long-forgotten person
Spirit.abilities: Protective aura – Temporarily increases the hero's spiritual resistance, protecting from attacks by creatures with high spiritual power

Shadow.description: Blurred, immaterial silhouette resembling a human shadow. In the dark, it can take the form of loved ones or trusted individuals. Moves stealthily, inducing anxiety and strengthening the hero's fears.
Shadow.abilities: Can transform into someone dear to you, strong hit to the hero's mental state

Statue.description: Stone figure resembling an ancient deity or warrior, holding fragments of broken bodies as weapons
Statue.abilities: Throws body parts when approached within 3 tiles

The Rotting of Life.description: A living mass, resembling a lump of black slime, with fragments of bones that sometimes flicker, slowly crawls towards the enemy

Bloody Leech.description: Long, writhing creature resembling a giant worm

Angry Guardian.description: A huge metal armor with no visible owner inside, whose blows are slow but devastating
Angry Guardian.abilities: Each damage taken increases the impact force by 1 (max +5)

Inquisitor of Agony.description: A former priest turned torturer, fanatically believing that through suffering he "purifies" souls.

Devastated Mage.description: A cloaked figure floating above the ground, with long, thin arms

Hungry Wraith.description: A ghostly figure with bony hands and a face with gaping mouth, seemingly screaming forever
Hungry Wraith.abilities: Only spiritual attacks work on him

Rat.description: Small rodent with red eyes and a long tail. Its teeth gleam with venomous saliva
Rat.abilities: Each attack reduces the opponent's health by 1 point for 3 turns

Defiled Cultist.description: A man with deformed facial features, dressed in cultist robes, holding an old, bloodstained staff

Dead Tree.description: An ancient tree resembling a terrifying, humanoid figure with hollow eyes. Its roots move like snakes, and the bark is marked with traces of blood.
Dead Tree.abilities: Has an effect on the mental state after hitting the enemy

Ashborne Specter.description: The spirit of a victim burned at the stake, whose body still smokes from the eternal heat. His eyes burn and his breath is like a fiery blast
Ashborne Specter.abilities: Only spiritual attacks work on him

Broken Marionette.description: An abandoned puppet with wooden limbs, cracked face, and torn strings. It moves in jerks as if someone invisible is still pulling the strings. Its face is frozen in a creepy smile
Broken Marionette.abilities: Soul Drain – Attacks restore 2 health points to him (That is, if it hits, it takes 2 life points from the enemy and adds them to itself)

Poisoned Monk.description: Emaciated, almost skeletal figure in a dirty, tattered habit. Hands covered in sores, eyes vacant, mouth twisted into a sinister grin.
Poisoned Monk.abilities: After death, a poisonous gas of double the power explodes

Root Guardian.description: Gigantic living root with spiky vines, covered in juices resembling blood
Root Guardian.abilities: Has an effect on the mental state after hitting the enemy

Withering Acolyte.description: A fanatical follower of a dark cult whose body was drained of life as a sacrifice to his master. His sinewy skin is covered in ritual markings.
Withering Acolyte.abilities: Critical Hit - Every third successful hit deals double damage

Fire Choker.description: Demon with burning skin, long arms, and red eyes, releases fire around itself when attacking
Fire Choker.abilities: Deals 3 damage to anyone within 2 tiles when attacking or to anyone attacking, even if it misses

Winged Nightmare.description: Large, winged monster with wings resembling torn skin
Winged Nightmare.abilities: Aerial attack (Attacks are only effective if the weapon is ranged 2+ or spiritual power)

Rotting Flesh.description: Large creature made of decaying body parts
Rotting Flesh.abilities: Once every 3 turns summons 2 "The Rotting of Life" + Has an effect on the mental state after hitting the enemy
